name: vsts-release-web-test
description: Release Task that will test the availability of a web application after the deployment step so you can determin if the release was successful or not
author: Jeff Przylucki

inputs.name: url
inputs.label: Url(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Url subject to the test. Addresses must begin with the appropriate protocol (http/https).  You may include multiple urls by providing a comma separated list. (ex. http://myserver1/api/healthcheck, http://server2/api/healthcheck)

inputs.name: retryAttemptCount
inputs.label: Number of Retry Attempts
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of time to retry the call to the site before failing. A value of 0 will not retry.  Good values are ususally between 1 and 5.
